channel.title: Conquest 2.0 PvP Alpha
channel.description:
With the release of some systems I made for PvP I'd really like to test them out more thoroughly therefore I am going to be putting the server up for some SPAWN/SET LEVEL PKing.
You can spawn whatever item(s) you like you can use this to find items: [url=http://www.itemdb.biz]ItemDB | 745[/url]
Please use this to get connected: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27803395/client.jar
Some Media:
Anyhow, this is my take on a Targeting System (something like Bounty Hunter), note, this isn't force upon the players to get assigned a target you must enable Target Finding first, this is only a way for PvPers to get paid a little better.
Anyhow it works like this, when in the wild and searching for a Target you can get assigned a target that is any of the following: ~10 Combat levels lower than you - Classified As: Overqualified ~10 Combat levels higher than you - Classified As: Underdog = Combat or 5 Combat levels higher or lower than you - Classified As: Even
If you win being the Underdog of course the reward will be better, overqualified fighters take a small cut off of their pay, and the even fight is a decent payout.
I just made a video of the base system here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jPXXTLYQ7s4
[img]http://puu.sh/aiWDB/e64650e557.jpg[/img]
